'''Frenzied Rockslide''' is [[Traveler (Geo)]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*This passive counts as Normal Attack damage, and thus can trigger weapon passives such as those of [[Prototype Rancour]] and [[Mistsplitter Reforged]].
*This talent is similar to [[Slitting Wind]], the 1st Ascension Passive of [[Traveler (Anemo)]], which deals Anemo damage on the last hit instead of Geo.
